Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory366.png'}
{3: 'Lamia nods and leaps onto a roof nearby.'}
{3: 'Roland reaches out to the rusty gate.'}
{3: 'The dust-covered bolts are moved, leaving a circle of light yellow ashes between the inner and outer rings.'}
{3: 'The dilapidated frames give a horrible squeak, as if they are fighting the power that is about to change them.'}
{3: 'Eventually, they succumb to the power and give in to the new visitor.'}
{3: 'The gate watches the new visitor as he enters its territory.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory388.png'}
{3: 'Roland walks into the front yard, a space that resembles a time capsule.'}
{3: 'Rough pottery pieces are scattered under the wall. Firewood chips are neatly placed next to a smashed fireplace wall, as if they were just freshly chopped in the morning.'}
{3: 'The ground surface is in extremely poor condition due to lack of maintenance, but tools are nicely placed along the wall.'}
{3: 'Everything about this place shows that someone used to live here, albeit a long time ago.'}
{3: 'Roland calmly walks through it, until he sees a crude clay plate at an inconspicuous place on the outside wall.'}
{3: '—"This is the home of Luna and Lucia, built by Daddy and Mommy together!"'}
{3: 'A complex emotion has grasped Roland. Many scenes have come to his mind.'}
{3: 'Perhaps she used to toddle from the living room to the kitchen, carrying a basket full of freshly picked potatoes.'}
{3: 'Perhaps she used to rush from the first floor to the second, holding a paperplane that Dad made while making a "whoosh" sound.'}
{3: 'Perhaps...'}
{3: 'Luna was once here, and she left. If she really had come back for some reason...'}
{3: 'But she is now lost. None of the "perhaps" can change this fact.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: '...Better get back to the topic.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "Why would they lure Babylonia's Task Force to this place, and why do they want me to come here.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'There should be an answer to all these questions.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Roland starts to carefully search every nook and cranny of the ruins.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory367.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lamia', 3: 'Eek... How long are you going to keep me waiting...?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "Hmm? What's that...?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lamia notices a wandering phantom on the street.'}
{3: 'It travels through the streets without concealing its action, kicking the corner of walls, or spraying something on the wall with its head every now and then.'}
{3: 'Lamia watches it until it disappears after turning around a corner.'}
{3: 'But she soon hears engine sounds from where it disappears, and sees a black figure rising to the sky.'}
{3: 'Lamia trembles at the somewhat familiar sight.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{2: '??', 3: '"You got that thing. Hand it over."'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory367.png'}
{1: '1', 3: "It's the black ghost that has been haunting her ever since she left the underground cavern."}
{3: "But after giving away Huaxu's key, she has no asset left."}
{3: 'If she is caught... She will be doomed.'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: 'But Lamia must not die... I must survive... to...', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory372.png'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Roland has been wandering around in the house for a while, he thinks he has checked almost all the possible places.'}
{3: '—But he still has no clue about what to do next.'}
{3: 'He steps into a destroyed bathroom in the hope that "something may happen if he tries to do something."'}
{3: 'Most of the things inside are demolished, except the large mirror. It is surprisingly intact apart from one long, horizontal crack.'}
{3: "Only traces of history remain in this place. He can peek into Luna's past, but cannot reach the present."}
{3: 'Can he really find clues of Luna here? Before this, how long has he travelled? How many options has he ruled out?'}
{3: 'This pursuit almost took his life in the underground waterway.'}
{3: "No matter what, he probably won't find anything useful from this mansion of the past on his own."}
{3: '—Still, it cannot explain why the other two groups also have their eyes on this place.'}
{3: 'Or... Could it be just the result of an incorrect decision, or a foolish mission from Babylonia?'}
{3: "If that's the case... Where should he go next? What is he going to look for?"}
{3: 'Roland looks at his somewhat unfamiliar black body in the mirror. He cannot help but feel a little sentimental, for too many people and things have changed.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: "I didn't realize... Is this what I look like now?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland?', 3: 'Why, do you prefer this look instead?'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg2001_12.jpg'}
{3: 'The Roland in the mirror becomes smudged with gray, while the red color is replaced by yellow.'}
{3: 'Roland sees what he used to look like.'}
{2: 'Roland?', 3: 'Hermano.'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'Did anyone ever tell you that you looked extremely annoying?'}
{2: 'Roland?', 3: 'Never by myself.'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'Coming out at such an awkward timing... What do you want?'}
{2: 'Roland?', 3: 'You are too painful to watch. I need to teach you a lesson.'}
{2: 'Roland?', 3: '"Roland", use your brain and think—who on earth are you?'}
{2: 'Roland?', 3: "An actor? A knight? A stray dog? An Ascendant? Luna's loyal servant?"}
{2: 'Roland?', 3: 'Stop lying to yourself.'}
{2: 'Roland?', 3: 'You are just who you are.'}
{2: 'Roland?', 3: "You aren't anyone else. You aren't an item. You are just yourself, the one and only you in this world."}
{2: 'Roland?', 3: 'Go onward, and one day you will be able to answer me—who are you?'}
{2: 'Roland?', 3: 'Your ideals, your recognition, your violence, your cunning.'}
{2: 'Roland?', 3: 'Maybe you need someone to rely on, some belief to follow, or a mission to give you a reason to live on.'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: '...And what does that have to do with my current situation?'}
{2: 'Roland?', 3: "I'm just reminding you that in this show, you can do a lot more than you think."}
{2: 'Roland?', 3: 'You may have been a little lost after losing your direction...'}
{2: 'Roland?', 3: "But you are unique. There's no one else like you in this world."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory372.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland?', 3: 'Go, my puppy. Use them, get what you want, and tear them apart—', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland?', 3: "Do you seriously think you can get what you want by giving trust to others? This cruel world doesn't run that way.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland?', 3: "The world doesn't disappear even when the symbol is gone. The world is still there, so are the things represented by that symbol.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland?', 3: 'Whether you understand or not, just remember what I said.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: 'The world is still there, so are the things represented by that symbol...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Roland stands in front of the mirror and clenches his fists.'}
{3: '—Lamia pokes her head through the door.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lamia', 3: 'That Task Force girl is almost at the gate!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'She came faster than I thought... I can only do as much as I can before our "guest" arrives.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'If they want to bring the Task Force and us together and watch us kill each other, I need to set up some distractions.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: '—I may not have the time to turn the tide, but I can at least muddy the waters.', 4: '2'}
